import { useEffect } from 'react' import classes from './Preview.module.css' import socket from '../../context/socket.js' const Preview = ({round, redDrawer, blueDrawer}) => { useEffect(() => { setTimeout(() => {socket.emit('getRoundData')}, 5000) }, []) return (

{round}

{redDrawer}

{blueDrawer}

) } export default Preview
